thread.title: Rise of the metrosexual traveller: Men spend £400 on TAN and new clothes before holiday
thread.title_full: Rise of the metrosexual traveller: Men spend £400 on TAN and new clothes before holiday

title: Rise of the metrosexual traveller: Men spend £400 on TAN and new clothes before holiday
text:
Rise of the metrosexual traveller: Men spend £400 on TAN and new clothes before holiday Rise of the metrosexual traveller: Men spend £400 on TAN and new clothes before holiday WOULD you believe men are spending over £400 on beauty treatments before they go on holiday? PUBLISHED: 16:03, Wed, Aug 5, 2015 | UPDATED: 16:08, Wed, Aug 5, 2015 GETTY A staggering 19 per cent of holiday-making males admit to spending over £400 on n beauty treatments 
Women may get flack for taking their time to get ready in the morning but it's apparently the men who are over-preparing for their holidays. 
New research has revealed a staggering 19 per cent of holiday-making males admit to spending over £400 on beauty treatments and clothing before jetting off. 
In comparison, only 8 per cent of women spent the same amount - who said gender stereotypes were still in place? 
Leading brand Gala Bingo commissioned the independent survey to celebrate its search for the most ‘Marbs’ person in the UK. 
The survey found over a quarter of people who have been to the popular Spanish city of Marbella spent £200-£300 on beach prep alone. Related articles
